message.content:
cs.SD, cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.SI, cs.SDQ 

The paper proposes audio-visual methods to isolate the voice of a single speaker and eliminate unrelated sounds. This involves using face motions captured in the video to estimate the speaker's voice, which is applied as a filter on the input audio. Therefore, the paper is likely to belong to the following arXiv CS sub-categories:

- cs.SD (Sound)
- cs.MM (Multimedia)
- cs.CV (Computer Vision)
- cs.SI (Speech and Natural Language Processing)
- cs.SDQ (Sound and Music Computing)
